update.description: 2015-03-04 Update: 1. Read forward function works 2. Show percentage read 3. Automatically switch reading line to new active window while perserving previous window's original title text 4. Toggle show/hide reading line function works 5. Switching window perserves show/hide reading line status 6. Rewrote application exit logic; restore window to its original title text on exit 7. Some code cleaning and small bug fixed
